name: manned
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
past simple and past participle of
man
A manned vehicle has a person or people inside in order to operate it: China announced plans to launch a manned spacecraft.manned aircraft Drones have largely replaced manned aircraft for reconnaissance purposes.
relating to travel in a vehicle with a person or people inside in order to operate it: In strictly practical terms, manned space missions make little sense. We were shown footage of the first manned Moon landing.
A manned gate, petrol station, etc. has a person or people there to guard it or work in it. : A high stone fence surrounds the estate, and cars enter through manned gates. Almost all manned petrol stations accept British bank cards.
